<form onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); checkAnswer('module1_mcq_q89')" data-correct-answer="E"> 
  <strong style="display: block;">What happens when new shares are issued?</strong> 
  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q89" value="A"> A. Ownership of existing shareholders increases</label><br>
  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q89" value="B"> B. Dilution never occurs</label><br>
  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q89" value="C"> C. Ownership remains unchanged</label><br>
  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q89" value="D"> D. Existing shareholders gain control</label><br>
  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q89" value="E"> E. Existing shareholders’ ownership percentage decreases</label><br>
</form> 

<div id="feedback-module1_mcq_q89" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
